summary: Provides a mock implementation of the Amazon DynamoDB Accelerator (DAX) service for the Moto library, defining data models, custom exceptions, and response handling to simulate DAX API operations such as creating, describing, deleting, and configuring clusters.
business_intent: Allows developers to test and develop applications that interact with AWS DAX without requiring real AWS resources, by offering an inâ€‘memory, fully functional DAX service replica.
